title: Moderate: zlib security update
description:
The zlib packages provide a general-purpose lossless data compression library that is used by many different programs.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2022-37434 is retrieved from Red Hat
